message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm happy to start the price at $15,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is quite a bit below my bottom line. Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I would like to stick to my original budget. Could we possibly agree on $11,000 for the product?
